remarks: A collection of ordered pairs with an extension of a binary relation is a set.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Nov-2017.)
statement:
opabbrex.1 $e |- ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) -> ( f ( V W E ) p -> th ) ) $.
opabbrex.2 $e |- ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) -> { <. f , p >. | th } e. _V ) $.
opabbrex $p |- ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) -> { <. f , p >. | ( f ( V W E ) p /\ ps ) } e. _V ) $.
$d E f p $.
$d V f p $.
